channel.title: CVE Feed for Wow-Company -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wow-Company -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29445|2024-09-17T00:50:50.966Z -- wow-company -- popup%20box%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (administrator or higher role) Local File Inclusion (LFI) vulnerability in Wow-Company's Popup Box plugin <= 2.1.2 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-29447|2024-09-17T02:58:02.668Z -- wow-company -- hover%20effects%20%E2%80%93%20easily%20create%20any%20hover%20effect%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (administrator or higher user role) Local File Inclusion (LFI) vulnerability in Wow-Company's Hover Effects plugin <= 2.1 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-43346|2024-08-18T13:18:38.073Z -- wow-company -- modal%20window
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Wow-Company Modal Window allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Modal Window: from n/a through 6.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-35634|2024-08-02T03:14:53.536Z -- wow-company -- woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20recent%20purchases
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Wow-Company Woocommerce – Recent Purchases allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Woocommerce – Recent Purchases: from n/a through 1.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-35629|2024-08-02T03:14:53.535Z -- wow-company -- easy%20digital%20downloads%20%E2%80%93%20recent%20purchases
item.description: Improper Control of Filename for Include/Require Statement in PHP Program ('PHP Remote File Inclusion') vulnerability in Wow-Company Easy Digital Downloads – Recent Purchases allows PHP Remote File Inclusion.This issue affects Easy Digital Downloads – Recent Purchases: from n/a through 1.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-35634|2024-06-04T13:36:40.403Z -- wow-company -- woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20recent%20purchases
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Wow-Company Woocommerce – Recent Purchases allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Woocommerce – Recent Purchases: from n/a through 1.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-35629|2024-06-04T17:33:56.038Z -- wow-company -- easy%20digital%20downloads%20%E2%80%93%20recent%20purchases
item.description: Improper Control of Filename for Include/Require Statement in PHP Program ('PHP Remote File Inclusion') vulnerability in Wow-Company Easy Digital Downloads – Recent Purchases allows PHP Remote File Inclusion.This issue affects Easy Digital Downloads – Recent Purchases: from n/a through 1.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-35634|2024-08-08T16:06:33.190Z -- wow-company -- woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20recent%20purchases
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Wow-Company Woocommerce – Recent Purchases allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Woocommerce – Recent Purchases: from n/a through 1.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-43346|2024-08-19T15:26:53.776Z -- wow-company -- modal%20window
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Wow-Company Modal Window allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Modal Window: from n/a through 6.0.3.
